Yeoville Dinner Club

24 Rockey St, Bellevue, Johannesburg, 2198
from/per person R850
  • Home
  • Walking Tour
  • Yeoville Dinner Club and Graffiti
  • Walking
  • 4 Hours
  • Runs daily
  • Availability:2-15
  • Age:8-90

Description

Yeoville Dinner club and graffiti

Breaking bread in Yeoville. Yeoville dinner club is one of Sanza’s best activities. Meet one of the most vibrant, knowledgeable, streetwise cook, you’ll ever come across in our African time. Ok, wait! Just before you jump in your plate of African food, Sanza never forgets to ring these words in the walls of your memory, “One thing people must know about me is that I am a gastronomic smuggler.” You will never get tired of listening to this amazing brother speak, he is a chief storyteller under the tree of food.

Yeoville is one dynamic neighborhood in Johannesburg, it has many African cultures coexisting in its space. A child that grew up in Yeoville is likely to speak more than 10 African languages, this is little Africa. Here you'll find the biggest market selling produce common for African food recipes and traditions. The streets are just full of life, every street is tightly locked in with a sardine of people who make up this diverse place and its vibe.

Come inside, smell the different colors of food and the incense that hovers in the open tight space like a guru's house. The pictures on Sanza’s African cuisine restaurant form an almost odd but very interesting story. They make you feel like you were part of every experience expressed on the wall- oh no… go ahead ask him any question you want, he springs to an answer even in the coldest winter times, his conversations are cozy and versatile at any season of the year. Whether you book during the day or the late hours, it is totally up to you, think about it the experience awaits you.

What's included

  • Dinner with Sanza
  • Transfers
